title: AI-First Full-Stack Engineer
description:
Title: AI\\-First Full\\-Stack Engineer (Part\\-Time Contract to Launch)
 





 Location: Remote
 





 Reports to: Founder, Adrian Patty
 




  





**The Mission: Launch the Platform for Retirement Wellbeing** 





 Impaktful is focused on solving the non\\-financial challenges of retirement. We are building an AI workflow orchestration engine designed to help people transition from planning their next phase of life to taking meaningful action. The platform's core components and features have been developed, and we are now in the final mile: the critical phase of stabilization, configuration, and deployment. We're looking for a forward\\-thinking engineer to partner with us, using AI\\-agentic coding as a primary tool to get our product launched.
 




  





**Your Role: The AI\\-Augmented "Finisher"** 





 You are a deeply technical full\\-stack engineer who understands code, architecture, and systems from first principles. However, you choose to build and debug with an AI\\-first mindset. You default to using AI agents (like Cursor) and advanced code generation to solve problems, writing manual code only when necessary. You are a master of prompt engineering for code, an expert at verifying and integrating AI\\-generated outputs, and a pragmatist focused on the fastest path to a robust, production\\-ready solution.
 




  





**What You'll Do:** 



* **AI\\-Agentic Problem Solving:** 

 Leverage AI coding agents and LLMs as your primary tool to diagnose and resolve complex bugs, configuration issues, and integration challenges.
* **CI/CD \\& Environment Configuration:** 

 Take full ownership of the CI/CD pipeline. Configure, stabilize, and automate the end\\-to\\-end testing (Playwright) and deployment process for our Vercel environment.
* **System Stabilization:** 

 Triage the remaining backlog of bugs and feature\\-polish tickets, using an AI\\-driven workflow to implement, test, and validate fixes at an accelerated pace.
* **Strategic Code Implementation:** 

 When AI\\-generated code is insufficient, use your senior\\-level expertise to write clean, efficient, and maintainable TypeScript code that seamlessly integrates with the existing architecture.
* **Founder Collaboration:** 

 Work directly with the founder, Adrian Patty. Adrian has architected the platform and possesses a deep solutions\\-architect level of technical understanding, but is not a hands\\-on coder. Your role will be to translate this architectural vision into a stable, launched product.



  





**The Opportunity: Beyond Launch** 





 This initial contract is focused on one critical goal: launching the platform. Success here opens the door to the next exciting phase of our journey. Post\\-launch, we will move into rapid iteration and enhancement, focusing on:
 



* **Scaling the Ecosystem:** 

 Expanding our B2B partner integrations and enhancing the Partner Dashboard with richer data and insights.
* **Deepening Personalization:** 

 Leveraging the data from our growing community to make our AI\\-driven pathways even more intelligent and empathetic.
* **API\\-First Expansion:** 

 Building out our API to become the indispensable, trusted engine for retirement wellbeing, powering a host of future technologies and partners.



  





**Core Technical Landscape:** 





 You must have a fundamental understanding of and hands\\-on experience with the majority of this stack. Your job will be to configure and debug it, primarily through AI\\-driven methods.
 



* **AI Environment:** 

 Cursor
* **Core:** 

 TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, React 18, Vite
* **Database:** 

 PostgreSQL (Neon Cloud), Drizzle ORM
* **Testing:** 

 Playwright (critical for E2E stabilization), Jest, React Testing Library
* **Infrastructure:** 

 Vercel, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, or similar)
* Authentication:\\*\\* Passport.js, JWT



  





**Role Details:** 



* **Part\\-Time Contract (2\\-4 hours/day):** 

 This is a flexible, part\\-time role with an expected commitment of 2\\-4 hours per day. It's perfect for an expert currently in a full\\-time position who is looking for an exciting project to contribute to and generate extra earnings.
* **High\\-Impact:** 

 You are not just a cog in a machine; you are the critical partner who will help bring a powerful vision to life.



  





**This Role is for You If:** 



* You are fluent in "prompting" and can guide an AI to produce complex code and configurations within an environment like Cursor.
* You have a history of successfully configuring and managing CI/CD pipelines for platforms like Vercel.
* You possess a strong foundational knowledge of full\\-stack development, enabling you to effectively validate, debug, and stitch together AI\\-generated code.
* You are a pragmatic "finisher" who gets immense satisfaction from shipping and stabilizing complex products.
* You thrive in a high\\-autonomy role and enjoy collaborating directly with a strategic, technical founder.



  






 This is a unique opportunity to be on the bleeding edge of software development, using AI to launch a platform with the potential for massive social impact.

title: Backend Developer Intern
description:
**About Fiel** 




 Fiel is a consumer services startup dedicated to simplifying home life by connecting households with reliable and skilled professionals, including cooks, maids, and other household help. Our platform ensures convenience, trust, and quality by offering vetted and verified professionals on demand. With a mission to make daily chores stress\\-free, Fiel is revolutionizing how people access household assistance.
 



  





 Join our growing team of innovators in Bengaluru as we build a seamless mobile application that empowers users to find trusted home assistance at their fingertips!
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We‚Äôre looking for a passionate
 **Backend Developer Intern** 
 to help us build and scale the backend of our platform. This is a hands\\-on opportunity to work with Node.js and MongoDB on real\\-world features that impact thousands of users.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain backend services and RESTful APIs using
 **Node.js** 
 and
 **MongoDB** 
 .
* Implement authentication, data models, and business logic for new features.
* Ensure code quality, performance, and security of backend services.
* Collaborate with frontend developers, product managers, and designers to deliver end\\-to\\-end functionality.
* Debug and resolve backend issues to maintain smooth operations.
* Document APIs and backend processes for internal use.
* Stay updated with the latest trends in Flutter development and suggest improvements.



  





**Desired Skills \\& Qualifications** 



* 2nd or 3rd year college students preferred (or recent graduates with relevant skills).

 **Node.js** 
 \\+
 **MongoDB** 
 .

* Basic understanding of Git/GitHub for version control.
* Bonus: Knowledge of Express.js, security best practices, or deploying Node apps.



  





**What we Offer** 



* A
 **paid internship** 
 with a competitive stipend.

* A collaborative environment where your ideas are valued and implemented.

**How to Apply** 




 If you are passionate about building intuitive user interfaces and meet the qualifications listed above, please send your resume, portfolio (if available), and a brief cover letter explaining your interest in the role to
 **info@thefiel.com** 
 . Include "Frontend Developer Intern Application ‚Äì \\[Your Name]" in the subject line.

This role requires a deep understanding of the Adobe Experience Platform and its capabilities to enhance customer experiences through data driven insights. If you are passionate about leveraging technology to create exceptional customer experiences and meet the qualifications outlined above, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

title: Senior Software Engineer Java
description:
Job description:
 



 5\\+ year
 



  





 Java threading spring
 



  





 The Role Software Engineer Java
 



  





 The Location Gurgaon
 



  





 The Team
 



  





 Lending Solutions form the industry standard webbased platform dedicated to automating the lifecycle of trades in the global loan markets The loan settlement platform simplifies trade settlement by providing a fully digitized integrated collaborative realtime platform for buyers sellers service providers and agent banks to capture acknowledge and settle primary and secondary market loan trades It provides secure messaging solutions to improve settlement liquidity and efficiency in the loan markets facilitates posttrade automation and provide realtime reporting based on the status of open and historical trades The wider business includes the leading global site for loan position reconciliation as well as secure wire instructions administrative details making our team a highly desirable environment for technology professionals interested in working for the global leader in the syndicated loan ecosystem
 



  





 The Impact
 



  





 We are looking for an experienced technologist to become a member of the Loan Platforms development team based in Gurgaon India This person will work closely with existing team members in this dynamic and challenging industry to develop and maintain innovative solutions for stateoftheart centralized loans settlement platform with emphasis on test ability and leveraging existing components to accomplish timely delivery of software products according to the business schedule
 



  





 Being chiefly responsible for ongoing development with Java technologies
 



  





 Whats in it for you
 



  





 Be a part of an industry leading Fortune 500 company
 



  





 Be a part of GREAT PLACE TO WORK Certified firm
 



  





 Be a part of a People First organization that Values Partnership Integrity and Discovery to Accelerate Progress
 



  





 Develop and deliver industryleading software solutions using cuttingedge technologies and the latest toolsets
 



  





 Plenty of training and development programs that support continuous learning and skill enhancement
 



  





 Build a fulfilling career with a truly global and leading provider of financial market intelligence data and analytics

 Must have 69 years of application development experience in the following
 



  





 oJava 17
 



  





 oSpring Spring Boot
 



  





 oRest API MultiThreading
 



  





 oSQL Server database
 



  





 Experience using AI coding assistants eg GitHub Copilot Code Whisperer to accelerate development while maintaining high code quality
 



  





 Proficiency in developing and implementing MCP servers to enable seamless integration between AI assistants and external systems tools and data sources
 



  





 Strong familiarity with agentic AI principles including autonomous decisionmaking systems adaptive learning mechanisms and intelligent agent architectures that can operate independently while learning from interactions
 



  





 Advanced skills in prompt engineering techniques and model finetuning to optimize AI performance for specific use cases and domain requirements
 



  





 Understanding of RDF Resource Description Framework SPARQL query language and SHACL Shapes Constraint Language for data validation and modeling Experience with semantic graph databases particularly Stardog and domainspecific ontologies including FIBOCDM frameworks
 



  





 Strong Knowledge of Java distributed computing technologies Spring REST and modern Java web technologies
 



  





 The right candidate would also demonstrate solid OO programming including Object Oriented Design Patterns and have strong opinions on best programming practices
 



  





 Well versed with continuous integration and continuous delivery tools and techniques
 



  





 Improve and maintain continuous deployment methodologies including working with SQA teams to enforce unit regression and integration testing
 



  





 Work closely with analysts to gather business requirements develop and deliver highly scalable and numerate financial applications
 



  





 Validate developed solutions to ensure that requirements met and the results meet the business needs
 



  





 Personal competencies
 



  





 Strong analytical investigative and problemsolving skills
 



  





 Commitment to producing quality work in a timely manner
 



  





 Must be confident articulate and fast learner
 



  





 Willing to progress in an exciting fast paced environment
 



  





 Selfstarter with a natural curiosity to learn and develop capabilities
 



  





 Strong oral and written communication skills
 



  





 Interpersonal skills and ability to work cooperatively with cross functional teams
 



  





 Strong team player who is comfortable working on a variety of projects using diverse technologies
 



  





 Skills:
 



 Mandatory Skills : Java,Microservices,React,AWS Lambda,AWS RDS,AWS S3,SpringBoot,Javascript/jQuery,BootStrap/CSS/CSS3,AWS API Gateway,AWS CloudFormation,SQS,SNS,Aws Step Functions,Dynamo DB,HTML/HTML5,Kafka,MySQL,TypeScript,AWS VPC,AWS EC2,Java SpringBoot

title: Data Engineer‚Äî @Meta
description:
**üöÄ Hiring: Data Engineer @ Meta ‚Äì Offshore Team (Remote, Full\\-Time/Contract, Hyderabad, Telangana)** 




  





 ‚úÖ Location: Hyderabad, Telangana
 **(Remote within India)** 




 ‚úÖ Client: Meta (Offshore team)
 



 ‚úÖ Compensation:
 **‚Çπ25 LPA ‚Äì ‚Çπ48 LPA (depends on experience)** 




 ‚úÖ Experience: 2\\+ years (Multiple Positions)
 



  





**Data Engineer, Product Analytics Responsibilities** 



* Conceptualize and own the data architecture for multiple large\\-scale projects, while evaluating design and operational cost\\-benefit tradeoffs within systems
* Create and contribute to frameworks that improve the efficacy of logging data, while working with data infrastructure to triage issues and resolve
* Collaborate with engineers, product managers, and data scientists to understand data needs, representing key data insights in a meaningful way
* Define and manage Service Level Agreements for all data sets in allocated areas of ownership
* Determine and implement the security model based on privacy requirements, confirm safeguards are followed, address data quality issues, and evolve governance processes within allocated areas of ownership
* Design, build, and launch collections of sophisticated data models and visualizations that support multiple use cases across different products or domains
* Solve our most challenging data integration problems, utilizing optimal Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) patterns, frameworks, query techniques, sourcing from structured and unstructured data sources
* Assist in owning existing processes running in production, optimizing complex code through advanced algorithmic concepts
* Optimize pipelines, dashboards, frameworks, and systems to facilitate easier development of data artifacts
* Influence product and cross\\-functional teams to identify data opportunities to drive impact
* Mentor team members by giving/receiving actionable feedback



  





**Minimum Qualifications** 



* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, relevant technical field, or equivalent
* 2\\+ years of experience where the primary responsibility involves working with data. This could include roles such as data analyst, data scientist, data engineer, or similar positions
* 2\\+ years of experience with SQL, ETL, data modeling, and at least one programming language (e.g., Python, C\\+\\+, C\\#, Scala, etc.)



  





**Preferred Qualifications** 



* Master's or Ph.D degree in a STEM field



  






 As a Data Engineer at Meta, you will shape the future of people\\-facing and business\\-facing products we build across our entire family of applications (Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, WhatsApp, Reality Labs, Threads). Your technical skills and analytical mindset will be utilized in designing and building some of the world's most extensive data sets, helping to craft experiences for billions of people and hundreds of millions of businesses worldwide.

Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to define project requirements and specifications. Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members. Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. Identify and troubleshoot software defects and issues. Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to enhance development processes. Mentor junior developers and contribute to team knowledge sharing. Participate in Agile development processes, including sprint planning and retrospectives. Mandatory Skills: Proven experience with Sanity CMS, including content modeling and API integration. Strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Experience with front end frameworks such as React, Vue.js, or Angular. Solid understanding of RESTful APIs and web services. Familiarity with version control systems, particularly Git. Excellent problem solving skills and attention to detail. Preferred Skills: Experience with server side languages such as Node.js or Python. Knowledge of cloud services (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud). Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices. Experience in Agile/Scrum methodologies. Understanding of SEO best practices and web performance optimization. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. 7 10 years of professional experience in software development. Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Proven track record of delivering high quality software projects on time. If you are a passionate software developer with a strong background in Sanity CMS and are looking to take your career to the next level, we encourage you to apply.

title: SRE/DevOps Engineer
description:
**Title:** 
 SRE/DevOps Engineer
 



**Location:** 
 Bangalore India (Remote\\- occasional onsite visit)
 



**Job Type** 
 : Fulltime with BayOne Solutions
 



  





 The Customer Experience Engineering (CXE) organization is responsible for maintaining the CI/CD and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) pipelines that support the Customer Experience (CX) platforms. These platforms serve as key entry points for customers into various services.
 



 The CXE Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) team manages the CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure, ensuring seamless deployment, monitoring, and maintenance. However, the team faces challenges in reliably managing AWS environments that support the CX Cloud, particularly in addressing infrastructure\\-related defects and optimizing automation workflows.
 



 To meet the growing demand from engineering teams outside SRE, it is essential to enhance pipeline efficiency, automate defect remediation, and improve infrastructure reliability.
 



**Scope:** 




 The supplier is being engaged to:
 



**‚Ä¢** 
 Develop, enhance, and manage CI/CD and IaC pipelines to support automated infrastructure deployment and maintenance.
 



**‚Ä¢** 
 Manage AWS environments, ensuring stability, scalability, and compliance with best practices.
 



  





 Perform cyclical analysis, development, and defect remediation for infrastructure\\-related issues.
 



**‚Ä¢** 
 Deliver automated and standardized defect remediation solutions to improve system reliability.
 



**‚Ä¢** 
 Maintain a consistent, reusable, and efficient defect resolution process through automated discovery, analysis, review, and fix implementation.
 



  





**Outcomes:** 




 This service will streamline infrastructure changes and defect remediation in AWS environments, enabling the SRE team to manage CI/CD and IaC pipelines with greater predictability and reliability. By automating defect resolution and optimizing cloud infrastructure, the supplier will help reduce operational overhead and accelerate deployment cycles.
 







**The expected business benefits of this service are:** 




 1\\. Create and Manage the GitHub Actions by leveraging the GitHub Actions Technology.
 



 2\\. Create and Manage the CloudBees CDRO pipelines leveraging the Javascript and/or Groovy Technology
 



 3\\. Improved Developer Experience by managing the Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CICD) pipelines.
 



 Repeatable steps to meet service delivery for SRE CI/CD and developer experience activities:
 



 1\\. Backlog Assignment: Supplier will receive infrastructure or pipeline management request by product owner through Jira board(s) and/or CDETS ( Defect Tracking System).
 



 2\\. Discovery: Supplier will engage with CXE teams to understand the requirements; engage with cross\\-functional teams to understand impacts, dependencies, and functional requirements; define timelines and acceptance criteria in Jira board(s) and/or CDETS.
 



 3\\. Analysis: Supplier with analyze requirements and document the functional solution/design.
 



 4\\. Solution review: The supplier will obtain sign\\-off from the CXE CloudOps teams for the proposed solution upon review.
 



 5\\. Development: The supplier will complete the design and develop the solution to effect defect remediation (the supplier manages the solution execution).
 



  





 While client is in charge of implementing changes into its environments through an internal change management process. Implement Continuous Delivery/Continuous Integration (CI/CD) pipelines using DevOps practices. Ability to create/manage custom pipelines in CloudBees CDRO with pipeline as a code.
 



 1\\. Solution validation (acceptance): Supplier to complete validation by having the Product owner review and accept the implementation work for defect remediation. If any additional documentation or materials are developed with the defect remediation, such as solution documentation, knowledge transfer, or training materials, they will be reviewed by for acceptance during this step.
 



 2\\. Update the status of the request in the Jira board(s) and/or CDETS and attach applicable enclosures, viz. logs, comments, documentation.
 



 3\\. Prepare for next request submitted through Jira board(s) and/or CDETS.
 



  





 BayOne is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any federal, state, or local protected class. This job posting represents the general duties and requirements necessary to perform this position and is not an exhaustive statement of all responsibilities, duties, and skills required. Management reserves the right to revise or alter this job description.

title: AI Engineer
description:

 This role is ideal for someone with deep hands\\-on experience in generative AI, large language models (LLMs), and Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation (RAG), who thrives in fast\\-paced environments and is passionate about solving real\\-world problems through AI.¬†
 



**Responsibilities** 




 Lead the design, development, and deployment of generative AI systems, including LLM\\-based agents and RAG pipelines.¬†

 Implement and optimize vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone, Qdrant) and retrieval systems for enterprise knowledge integration.¬†
 



 Drive prompt engineering, model fine\\-tuning, and performance evaluation strategies.¬†

**Qualifications** 




 Proven experience with generative AI, LLMs (OpenAI), and RAG architectures.¬†
 



 Strong programming skills in Python and familiarity with frameworks like LangChain, LangGraph, FastAPI.¬†

 Familiarity with MLOps practices and tools for scalable deployment and monitoring.¬†
 



 Excellent communication skills and a proactive mindset to contribute ideas beyond assigned tasks.¬†
 



 Preferred Experience in building production\\-grade AI agents for enterprise use cases. Background in NLP, transformers, and model orchestration.¬†
 



 Prior contributions to open\\-source AI projects or publications.

title: Senior Quality Assurance Automation Engineer
description:
The QA Automation Engineer is responsible for designing and executing the overall automation testing strategy for a broad range of applications and platforms. This individual will drive the overall testing strategy with the proper mix of business knowledge and technical leadership. Planning activities involve working closely with architects and technical leads to defining the long\\-term strategy for repeatable and scalable automation testing activities within the organization. Duties also include creating quality standards for products and testing systems for efficiency, reliability and performance.
 



  





 You perfectly match if you have:
 



 \\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=
 



 ‚Ä¢ Master's degree in computer science, Management Information Systems, or an IT related discipline, or its equivalent plus 2 years of related experience. Alternatively, will accept a bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, Management Information
 



 Systems, or an IT related discipline plus 5 years related experience, in lieu of a master‚Äôs degree.
 



 ‚Ä¢ 7\\+ years of experience in functional, non\\-functional, regression and acceptance testing.
 



 ‚Ä¢ 7\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in QA automation tools such as Selenium.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Should have strong experience in JAVA programming language.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently or in a team environment on multiple projects.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Agile and JIRA.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience in 508 accessibility and performance testing.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience in SQL scripting relational databases, Unit testing of Web applications
 



 ‚Ä¢ Excellent understanding of DB and behavior driven testing is required for this role.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience in working with software specifications and documentation.
 



 Experience in breaking the system and thinking out of the box while doing functional testing.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Thorough process knowledge on all phases of Agile and software releases.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical, debugging, planning, organizational and communication skills.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Detail\\-oriented and comfortable working with developers, product owners and other project stakeholders.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Should have worked in an onsite offshore model.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Should understand selenium tests and cucumber feature files and should be able to understand system and console logs.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Should have experience in writing UI and API level automated tests.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Should have experience with continuous integration environment such as Jenkins and Travis.
 



  





 Your day\\-to\\-day activities:
 



 \\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=\\=
 



 ‚Ä¢ Organize and manage QA automation test design and implementation tasks on a project.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Participate in requirements discussions and identify requirements that may be missing, wrong, or lack clarity.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Develop and execute tests for end\\-to\\-end scenarios, report customer\\-facing issues, and other externally initiated sources.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Develop and execute comprehensive test plans and test cases for integration runs.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Conduct and report on analysis of test results and coverage factors.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ensure proper communication occurs with the project teams on test status, issues and risk to deployment.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Work with development and project management to troubleshoot issues, manage change and mitigate risk.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ensure test cases are appropriately structured for automation execution when applicable.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Work with automation to incorporate new functionality into the automation test suite.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Provide guidance to Associate Engineers to execute test sets assigned to them, develop their own, and effective defect reporting.
